values: ...I accidentally kicked Percy, he got in the way of the couch. Fabian and Gideon can't be gone. I simply refuse to believe it. They wouldn't be stupid enough to get themselves in trouble! Oh, who am I kidding, they're idiots. They were idiots. They were idiots. Merlin, I could just hit them! How could they have done this to us!? It's not bloody fair! What idiots! They've gone and gotten themselves killed, I'm practically hysterical!
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/5537.html

Alice, why don't you bring around your little boy to come play with Ron? They're only a few months apart, and I'm sure they'd love the company. We can chat while they gurgle and look at us strangely, it'll be great, I feel as if I haven't seen you in forever.

In fact, it seems like everyone is hiding away these days <s>with good reason</s>.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/5149.html

<lj-cut text="Private">
Everything is so awful, it's hard to shield the boys from it all. I don't want to go out anymore, not with them being able to overhear things they shouldn't, but I can't very well leave them at home. What if something should happen to them, or me? I don't think I could ever live with myself if something happened to them. 

At least Amos and Acacia live close by, now. I feel slightly safer knowing that there's a wizarding family in the area, other than the Lovegoods. We can always count on them, as they can count on us. I hope nothing awful happens to any of us.
</lj-cut>

Arthur, when are you coming home? <s>I'm scared.</s> Fabian, why don't you come over? You too, Gideon! I'll set up a mattress, you can stay the night, it'll be nice. I'll make dinner, and we can all play wizarding chess or something. You can play quidditch with the boys, if you like. Cedric's staying the night with us, I'm sure he'd love to join in.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/4894.html

Gideon, will you come and look after the boys for a while? Just a little while, I promise. Well, maybe not a little while, you should probably bring a pair of pyjamas. I've left Bill in charge until you get here, okay? I've just got to floo off to Mungos for a while. 

<lj-cut text="Arthur">
First one to get to St. Mungos gets to hold the baby first! 
</lj-cut>
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/4623.html

Owls for Fabian Prewett can be redirected to The Burrow, for the moment being.

Gideon, you better hurry up and get over here.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/4403.html

None of my children will sleep tonight, I'm telling you now. I'll be hearing whispers and little footsteps looking out for Father Christmas until six in the morning, when they'll all come and bounce Arthur and I out of our bed so they can open their presents.

Arthur, I'm thinking you should get in the Santa suit at 3 this year, Percy was still up last year, remember how mortified he looked when you came down the chimney and almost broke your nose on the mantle?
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/4248.html

Okay, this girl, even though she's got about 2 and a half more months with me, IS REALLY BIG. Seriously. I keep thinking I'm nine months along when really I'm only seven.

ALICE, ALICE, YOU MUST COME OVER! I can share pregnancy tips with you and we can talk about baby names and clothes and their cute little hands!
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/3922.html

<lj-cut text="Arthur">
What're we doing, having another baby?<small> I just don't know what to do anymore, it's not safe.</small>
</lj-cut>

Percy, the cheeky sod, I said he could only have one biscuit but he took two. I can hardly look after him, what with Fred and George being as rowdy as they are. I never thought two little boys could cause so much mess.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/3728.html

Arthur, where are those passionfruits Fabian got me?! I NEED PASSIONFRUIT!! NOW.

You know, Mum says that passionfruit suggests that my baby will not only have a sweet tooth, but be a girl. To be honest, I'm rather glad that I'm not craving pickles like I was with Charlie, or lemons (Percy, my little sourface). This is a good thing.

PASSIONFRUIT, ARTHUR. NOW. PLEAASSEEE.

Percy is so adorable. He just came up and hugged my stomach. Said that he was praying to Merlin to have a little sister that he could look after. Bill and Charlie just want another brother to push around.

Acacia! If you want, you can bring Cedric over and he can play with Fred and George. They're so boisterous, honestly, I can never leave them alone, or the room will go to pieces.

Speaking of which, ARTHUR, WE NEED PASSIONFRUIT. FOR THE WALLS.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/3331.html

ARTHUR! ARTHUR! Fred...I think it was Fred, we should really get them little name bracelets, SAID DADA. He spoke, oh my god, my little boy spoke! He said it again! Oh my god! Arthur! Fabian! Gideon! Riley! Come over, you have to see this! 

...no, wait, it was George. Fred...no, George. FRED. I'm positive it was Fred!
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/3224.html

<lj-cut text="Private">
Fabs is married. My baby brother is married, he's not exactly my baby brother anymore. Oh, and she's so lovely.
I can't believe how fast time has gone. It seems like just yesterday when Mum brought him and Gid back from the hospital. Jeez, I feel all depressed, we're all getting old and withered, now. Soon we'll be like Mum and Dad, but stranger. 

Oh. My. God. I HAVE A SISTER-IN-LAW! A SISTER! I FINALLY HAVE A SISTER!
</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Riley">
When you and Fabs get back, I demand you come and have dinner at our house. 
</lj-cut>

Percy is so adorable, he's holding up his little book and pointing his favourite pictures out to Fr- George. Merlin, if Bill hadn't broken the camera, this would be an absolutely cute picture.

Arthur, do we have a camera in the shed?
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/2942.html

ARTHUR! Where is Bills little pin-on tie?! Where did Charlie go, for Christs sake, have you got him? Are you dressing him? 

Fred and George just will NOT get into their clothes. They're wriggling out and it- PERCY, STOP READING THAT BOOK AND BRUSH YOUR HAIR.

Whats thi- Merlin! Arthur, we forgot to give Riley that tiara from Aunty Muriel. Look after the kids, I'll go drop it of-

IS THAT TOMATO SAUCE ON YOUR SHIRT, ARTHUR WEASLEY?
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/2696.html

<lj-cut text="Arthur">
I was checking over the bank statement, and we've got less money than I thought we did. Are the bank charging more for fees? Should I go down and get angry at a goblin?
</lj-cut>

I have the most adorable sons ever. Bill and Charlie are reading to Percy, yes, you heard right, reading. Not fighting or anything. Reading. It's absolutely adorable.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/2373.html

<lj-cut text="Private">
Oh dear God. I went into the baby shop up in the village, to buy a new rattle because Fred took the liberty of breaking the old one. I couldn't afford any of them. I could barely afford bread on the way back home. What will we do? Arthur can't possibly do any more hours at the Ministry, I'd never see him at all. I couldn't possibly get a job, not with all the boys. My wage would be gone on babysitters. 
</lj-cut>

Fred and George..I don't know what is different with them. They're a lot more...violent than the other boys. They can roll around like nobodies business, but thank GOD they're beginning to sleep longer. I haven't slept without having to get up for them since we brought them home. 

Gid, can you come look after the boys while I take Fred and George to the doctors for their checkup? Please? George might even hold his arms out to you.

<lj-cut text="Arthur">
What time are you getting home tonight?
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/2223.html

Arthur, we need more eggs. And flour. And milk. Bill and Charlie tried to cook pancakes while I was feeding Fred and George, they looked so adorable too. Until the fire started. I swear, they're gorgeous, but if Bill doesn't stop lighting things on fire I'm going to make him sit outside.

Percy even managed to pick me some daisies. Daisies. It needs to be Mothers Day every day for the rest of forever. I could get used to this. 

<lj-cut text="Private">
Oh my GOD. I want six weeks to hurry up. NOW. Resting is all well and good, but Arthur just seems so strong and..my Goood. 
Six weeks better hurry up. I want these stitches out NOW. I want to be healed. Goddamit.
</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Fabian and Gideon">
Come over now and cook me some bacon. You need to bring the bacon.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/1813.html

<lj-cut text="Private">
<s>I WANT A GIRL.</s>
</lj-cut>

Thank God for the children looking after children rule. Bill and Charlie haven't left Fred and Georges side. It's a GREAT satefy thingywhatsit. If all goes silent, I know something is wrong. But Fred and George, my goodness. The most adorable boys ever!

UMBRIDGE YOU COW. Give my husband more time off or I'll off you.

<lj-cut text="Fabiette">
Come see your new nephews! And take Bill and Charlie for a game of Quidditch. They miss you already.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/1683.html
*Fastforwarded to the 30th of March* ARTHUR. HURRY UP. BABY. NOW. COMING. GET HOME. NOW.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/1440.html

<lj-cut text="Private">
My legs are SORE. I'm SORE. My ankles are sore! Bill and Charlie are running around like nobodys business! Just.....time to freeze people! 
I need a maid. Or more charms. Lots more charms. Charms are good. So are cookies. Cookies are so so good. I want more cookies.
And PASSIONFRUIT. God, I want lots of passionfruit! I need to go buy some passionfruit NOW. God, I want passionfruit so bad.
</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Fabio">
Yo, brother, go get me some passionfruit. Like...now.
</lj-cut>

Arthur! Oh, you should have seen it! Bill and Charlie just group hugged Percy! Besides the fact that I think they were trying to steal his cookies, but still. It was very, very cute. 

...And now they're chasing after each other. I think I'm going to read to Percy now. 

He ADORES Badjelly the Witch. Whenever I talk about Binklebonk the tree goblin, he giggles like mad.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/1063.html

<lj-cut text="Private">
Alices wedding tomorrow. TOMORROW. I'm not sure I'll fit my dress! What about Bill!? What if he cries in the middle of the ceremony!? Oh bugger, I need to start getting everything prepared! Bottles and nappies and a blanket and...
I'm going to be carrying a bloody large bag. I wonder if they'll have a place for mums to put their enormously large baby bags?

DO WE EVEN HAVE A WEDDING PRESENT FOR THEM?!!?!?
</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Alice">
Alice, will it be alright if I brung Bill to your wedding? I can't remember if I talked to you about it. <s>We have to bring him, it's too late for a babysitter...</s>
Also, best of luck for tomorrow. I bet you'll look stunning.
</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Arthur">
Where are your dress robes? I need to iron them. And you need to polish your shoes for tomorrow. Did we get a present for Alice and Frank? Should I make them a basket of something? Where did we put Bills good baby clothes from Aunt Lucretia? 
....help?
</lj-cut>
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/1014.html

FABINA, GIDETTE. MON FRERES. MES AMIS. I saw this in your room Mr Fabian 'I-like-to-say-my-only-nephew-is-named-after-a-plant' Prewett and decided to liberate it. I swear, I told Bill that you thought he was named after a plant and he started wailing like Myrtle on a bad day. You need to come apologise, or he'll pull your hair.

I guess I should sort of introduce myself before you all think I'm a crazy cat lady or something. 
Hi.
I'm Molly Weasley. Nice to meet you.

Gideon, are you coming to look after your nephew while I make dinner and clean up all the toys that seem to have covered the floor? I swear, I've never seen so many in my life. Aunt Muriel sent a million little trucks and cars, and Bill managed to throw them everywhere. Strong little mite, he is. 
You might even be able to stay for dinner. If I don't cook Shepherds pie. I remember the last time I cooked Shepherds pie...

...ohmygod. Baby vomit. On my couch.
http://mollysays-now.livejournal.com/712.html
